sub_topic: Probability of rolling a certain number on a dice
message_1: What is the probability of rolling a 5 on a fair dice?
message_2: A fair dice has 6 sides, each with an equal probability of being rolled. Since there is only one 5 on the dice, the probability of rolling a 5 is 1 out of 6 possible outcomes. Therefore, the probability is 1/6 or approximately 0.1667 (rounded to four decimal places).
